file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive interaction tests for ProfileCard component

patterns_discovered: Testing multiple interaction modes (click, keyboard, tab)
Mocking user events for detailed interaction testing
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle interactions when optional handlers are not provided
Importance of testing tab navigation and keyboard interactions
Ensuring components don't crash with minimal/null data
Testing multiple click scenarios on interactive elements
recommendations: Add more edge case tests for different prop combinations
Consider extracting common test utilities for repeated scenarios
Document interaction design patterns discovered during testing
